headline: The Bull Case For Carnival (CCL) Could Change Following Growth Plans And New Health-Safety Scrutiny
summary: Carnival Corporation & plc recently outlined plans to materially increase revenue by 2030 through fleet expansion and growth in markets such as Australia and New Zealand, while its profits, debt profile, and credit ratings have all improved. At the same time, a major norovirus outbreak on AIDAdiva and renewed CDC scrutiny highlight how health risks and sanitation standards remain central to Carnival’s long-term brand and earnings story. We’ll now examine how Carnival’s stronger financial...
